0.text: The tusker carries the Sacred Tooth Relic. The Diyawadana Nilame and other Nilames follow the tusker. Over a hundred elephants take part in this event. The four Dewala Peraheras go after that. The Perahera lasts for more than three hours. People around the world come to see it.
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The <break time='200ms'/> tusker <break time='200ms'/> carries <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> Sacred <break time='200ms'/> Tooth <break time='200ms'/> Relic. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> Diyawadana <break time='200ms'/> Nilame <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> other <break time='200ms'/> Nilames <break time='200ms'/> follow <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> tusker. <break time='200ms'/> Over <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> hundred <break time='200ms'/> elephants <break time='200ms'/> take <break time='200ms'/> part <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> this <break time='200ms'/> event. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> four <break time='200ms'/> Dewala <break time='200ms'/> Peraheras <break time='200ms'/> go <break time='200ms'/> after <break time='200ms'/> that. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> Perahera <break time='200ms'/> lasts <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> more <break time='200ms'/> than <break time='200ms'/> three <break time='200ms'/> hours. <break time='200ms'/> People <break time='200ms'/> around <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> world <break time='200ms'/> come <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> see <break time='200ms'/> it. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

1.text: Read the text aloud to students. Ask them to get into groups of five and make questions for highlighted sentences. Then each student should go around the class and interview two students and record their answers.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Read <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> text <break time='200ms'/> aloud <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> students. <break time='200ms'/> Ask <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> into <break time='200ms'/> groups <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> five <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> make <break time='200ms'/> questions <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> highlighted <break time='200ms'/> sentences. <break time='200ms'/> Then <break time='200ms'/> each <break time='200ms'/> student <break time='200ms'/> should <break time='200ms'/> go <break time='200ms'/> around <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> class <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> interview <break time='200ms'/> two <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> record <break time='200ms'/> their <break time='200ms'/> answers. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
